key_risks: Geopolitical and regulatory risks due to significant operations in China and U.S. export restrictions
Legal and financial concerns from class action lawsuits and volatile stock performance
Supply chain vulnerabilities from reliance on global suppliers
Intense competition in the semiconductor equipment market
controversies: Addition to the U.S. Entity List in December 2024
Class action lawsuits alleging securities fraud between March 2019 and October 2020
governance_issues: Potential regulatory challenges due to reliance on the Chinese semiconductor market

sources.title: ACM Research - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: ACM Research, Inc. (ACMR) is a publicly traded American semiconductor company that engages in the manufacture and sale of single-wafer wet cleaning equipment used to improve product yield. Although based in the U.S., the majority of the company's business is done in China through its subsidiary, ACM Research (Shanghai).
